ack.p: The authors would like to thank Ms. Harshita Sharma, Mr. Vishal, and Mr. Atanu Sen for their technical help during the experiment setup. We also thank Ms. Sharda Ray for her critical evaluation of this manuscript. The work has been supported by the All India Institute of Medical Sciences, New Delhi, and the Department of Biotechnology, Government of India. Graphical abstract was created using BioRender.com.
